summary: Tiny dungeon with plenty of traps and more to come. Iced at the moment.
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=300][color=orange][b] This is put on ice until further notice, I´m doing it because I don´t have the time to put in to this thing and I´ve also realized my skills with \"CAD\" & \"3DS Max\" is insufficent to make this mod what I want it to be for the time being. [/b][/color][/size][/u]

[u][size=50][color=red][b]This´s my very first MOD so please don´t trash it, it is however fully functional as far as I can tell.[/b][/color][/size][/u]

[color=blue][b]Features:[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]Tiny dungeon (2 rooms and 3 halls)
[*]plenty of traps (7 separate traps/ambushes) and more to come.
[*]~15 monsters
[*]A little bit of loot, not much but well worth it.
[/list]
It´s located just outside of Riverwood.

Feel free to post any shoots you take.

Any constructive criticism is appreciated, but flaming will be put out with the water-hoes.
Any ideas is also appreciated. (dungeon expansion, traps setup etc.)
I´ll try to answer any questions ASAP.

[size=5][b][u][color=red]Anyone trying this out should react fast, have resistance to fire, other types of damage and be prepared to re-load.
A couple of HP-potions might help too.[/color][/u][/b][/size]

[b]Installation:[/b]

[u][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/]NMM:[/url][/u]
[list=1] 
[*]Download 
[*]Install 
[*]Activate 
[/list]
Manual:
[list]
[*]Extract W1.esp to your \"skyrim\\data\" folder. 
[/list]

[b]Known bugs:[/b]
[list]
[*][color=green]None known.[/color]
[/list]

[size=150][b]Change log:[/b][/size]

[b]Version 0.1A[/b]
[list]
[*]First release 
[*]Small dungeon 
[*]7 working traps 
[/list]

[b]Version 0.12A[/b]
[list]
[*]Fixed clipping. 
[*]Added traps. 
[/list]

[b]Version 0.5B[/b]
[list]
[*]More monsters 
[*]1 more room 
[/list]

[color=yellow][b]To get the most out of this MOD try this:[/b][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2653]Subliminal Traps[/url] by Mr Dave
It´ll make it a lot more interesting to go through this dungeon.
author: Wibbe

files.name: W1 first release
files.changelogHtml:

Small dungeon
